Was cool before f2p update. Now my account is apparently being flagged as "not that trustworthy" and my Trust Factor is extremely low. Almost every MM seems to be full of recently created and/or bought accounts for me. Can't really play with friends because your squad trust factor is determined by the player with the lowest trust factor in the lobby. Don't know where TF came from, but suddenly it's not at all enjoyable to play (imo).. my 5 years 6k hours steam account is as trustworthy as a recently created account that just bought prime to boost their TF .. and i never ever cheated in any game on steam.

Okay so was intoduced to this game 6 months before it was free and i never thaught it would be the hame that i enjoyed most with friends, so this game can run on a crap pc like mine and it is so enjoyable especially if u play it with friends, i have a crappy pc and the only thing that i face is loafing match problems and smoke and molotoves lag me a bit, i get from 30 to 50 fps on a low end laptop, not even a pc and my pc isnt designed for gaming so i totally recommend this game, so enjoyable and no issues at all if u have a great pc.
